label: ProductCertificate
comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.

datatypeProperties.comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.
The process of certifying that a certain product has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.

referencedBy.comment: A product certificate applicable to this production waste material component.
A product certificate granted for this monitoring IOT device.
A product certificate obtained by means of this specified inspection result.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.
